text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 40 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
open a can of worms let's find out what
this idiom means and how to use it in
your daily conversation to open a can of
worms sometimes certain things that you
say or do put you in a situation which
is hard to deal with you find yourself
in a big mess or difficulty
this means knowingly or unknowingly you
have landed up in a difficult situation
to open a can of worms basically means
to be in a difficult situation or a very
big problem by opening a can of worms
you actually open the door to a whole
set of new problems so when you find
yourself dealing with a complex or
difficult situation you actually get
caught up in the middle of worms you can
use this phrase to describe a situation
which is difficult to handle or solve
and you feel stuck not knowing how to
come out of such a messy situation with
the right solution to open a can of
worms could also mean to invite
difficult or unwanted situation alright
now that you know what this idiom means
let's have a look at some example
sentences on how to use this idiom in
your daily conversation example 1 I
won't ask about Maria's divorce status I
would be opening a can of worms for
myself
example two repairing a car engine is
one thing but dealing with a truck
engine is like opening a whole can of
worms for the mechanic as he is a
fresher in this field example 3 the
shortcuts to the highway seemed easy on
the map but when we went through it was
nothing but opening a can of worms
example 4 after hyping up the political
scandal the media found themselves in a
can of worms example 5 Sam is focusing
on his final year of graduation advising
him to take up a job would open a can of
worms example 6 declaring the company's
poor financial position to our investors
will open a can of worms which will lead
to further complications example 7 by
bringing up the fight you had with Lisa
last night you are opening a can of
worms example 8
when I asked Mary about her new means of
earning money she got offended I didn't
realize that I was opening a can of
worms example 9 with so much diversity
in our country making a public comment
on any community would open a can of
worms
example 10 buying the shares of a
company we don't know of would be
opening a can of worms example 11 be
careful if you get into a partnership
with your nasty friend William you are
opening a can of worms for yourself
example 12 John opened a can of worms by
double-timing his girlfriend example 13
the minister's insensitive speech
towards the minorities opened a huge can
of worms for his party
